posts.author: kaillan
posts.content:
Hi,
I am looking for build that uses set traps skill and assassin class. I like Monk / Wizard / Assassin e.g. pious-doom-in-a-tunic-monk-9-assassin-1 ... 15369.html but it has so little skill points. On the other hand, Rogue / SD / Assassin looks fun, but I do not know what would be better ranged or melee and everyone sticks with halfling (i don't like small races). Can anyone help me decide? :) I want to play SOU / HOTU with this toon.

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
Rogue/SD/ASN id a safe bet, you can just as easily go Elf as Halfling. No worries. Epic Dodge and dual wielding. Dual wielding to get as many Death Attacks as possible while your enemy is flat footed. With HiPS it hardly matters tho.

Sent fra min SM-G950F via Tapatalk

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Here is a Wizard/ Monk/ Assassin that I have used some.
It can set Epic traps, detects Deadly traps and can recover its own traps. It uses spells to disarm everything else.
It can open locks with a DC up to 35, and uses the Knock spell for the more difficult ones.
It also has a level 10 Familiar to help out with Rogue skills if you choose the Pixie.
With increasing Assassin levels it becomes a deadly stalker.
Early on it can operate as a "spell-sword".  The arcane spells add to versatility throughout its career.
Dual wielding Kamas, it has 9 attacks per round buffed with Haste.
It has +10% speed from Monk. If you buff with Expeditious retreat it becomes super fast. Extend the spell if you want.
The BAB progression is slow during the first levels, but the high dexterity, the Monk attack schedule, the arcane spells and trap skills solve that.
It ends up with an AB of 41, which is very good for a "Rogue type" character.
Death attack DC is 39. Death attack damage is 13d6. Stunning fist DC is 29

posts.author: Asturonethoriusaline
posts.content:
The MOST OPTIMAL MULTICLASS ASSASSIN COMBINATION BUILDS WITHOUT BUILD EXACT LEVEL BY LEVEL BREAKDOWNS ARE:

1. Ranger/Assassin/SD

Level Splits:

Ranger 9/Shadowdancer 5(2-5)/Assassin 26 to 29

Why Best:

Ranger better then Rogue, Monk because better BAB, AB, 2 weapon fighting path of feats, Animal Companion, Ranger Druid Spells, Favored Enemy, skillpoints 4 + int, stealth skills, hide, ms, except no tumble, UMD, unless cross class points into tumble or wait until get Assassin points to dump into Tumble, UMD.

2. Monk/Assassin/Shadowdancer

Split:

Monk 6/Shadowdancer 5(2-5)/Assassin 29 to 32

Why 2nd Best: Monk AC, Flurry, Knockdown, IKD, rogue skills, Cleave

3. Monk/Cleric/Assassin

Split

Monk 2-6/Cleric 11-15/Assassin 19-27

Why?

Because Flurry, Cleric buffs, darkness, knockdown, IKD for death attacks.

4. Ranger/Cleric/Assassin

Split

Ranger 2-3/Cleric 13-15/Assassin 22-25

Why? Same reason as above #3

5. Monk/Ranger/Assassin

Monk 6/Ranger 9/Assassin 25

Why? Flurry + improved 2 weapon fighting = LOTS of attacks per round dual wielding at HIGH BAB, AB, while death attacking

6. Monk/wizard/Assassin

Monk 2-6/Wizard 11/Assassin 23 to 27.

Why? Because of Wizard Buff spells

7. Bard/Assassin/Shadowdancer

Split

Bard 8/Shadowdancer 2-5/Assassin 27-30

Why? Bard Spells, Buff song, rogue skills

8. Ranger/Bard/Assassin

Ranger 9/Bard 8/Assassin 23

Why? Ranger improved 2 weapon, animal companion, buffs, favored enemy, bard song, high BAB, AB

9. Rogue/Assassin/Shadowdancer

Split Rogue 4-9(stop at rogue level that gives Evasion, improved Evasion)/Shadowdancer 2-5/Assassin 26-34

Last of the X/Assassin/Shadowdancer builds, weakest of those builds because lower BAB, AB, no spellcasting, dual wielding harder unless spend limited feats on 2 weapon path. Basically rogue only gives rogue skills, uncanny dodge sooner, sneak attacks.

While good, better then other builds, this build not as good as the builds above it.


These top 9 builds are the most synergistical multiclass assassin builds

Builds like fighter/assassin, wizard/Assassin, Cleric/Assassin, Druid/Assassin, Barbarian/Assassin, etc, are just not as good as the above top 9 assassin builds.

The above list might be off in order, but maybe except for maybe 1, forgotten, overlooked combo, these are game mechanically the most synergistical OPTIMIZED Multi Class Assassin combos

If you want to make a Assassin, you should consider going by this list, then ask Mick to help you build whichever combo choose off of list.

Hope this helps.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:

If you want to make a Assassin, you should consider going by this list, then ask Mick to help you build whichever combo choose off of list./...
Since my name was brought up:
1) Read my Assassin guide that covers most things for Assassins, including multiclassing that is addressed here.
2) Try to make a build
3) Post here for help if you struggle with 2.

Hope that helps
Mick

posts.author: gkorjax
posts.content:
Valerfor speaks of a build that uses the shifter kobold commando shape. It is a lot of fun, though it can be difficult to play. It takes a while to get the kobold commando form. The paralyze part of the death attack is not the main focus of the build, but rather the sneak attack part.
I believe it is called something like "Death say Yip" or somesuch...

I'm about to restart one of my own versions of this on WoG, actually.

Edit: Err, woops MY version doesn't focus on the paralyze portion. Death say YiP DOES, taking lots of assassin levels. I prefer to go to shifter 17, for epic kobold commando and only 18 assassin levels.

posts.author: kaillan
posts.content: Thank you for your help and great ideas...but i have found this little gem Divine Bomber: Bard8/ AA9/ BG3 and I love it, although it does not have set trap skill...and i also love setting traps...so is it possible to modify this (or simillar archer) build to become a trap master? If the answer is yes then how to adapt it to hotu - just throw some more AA levels?

posts.author: Asturonethoriusaline
posts.content:
kaillan wrote: Thank you for your help and great ideas...but i have found this little gem Divine Bomber: Bard8/ AA9/ BG3 and I love it, although it does not have set trap skill...and i also love setting traps...so is it possible to modify this (or simillar archer) build to become a trap master? If the answer is yes then how to adapt it to hotu - just throw some more AA levels?
If you like that build, and since you wanted a Assassin build.

I suggest marrying that build idea with Assassin by replacing blackguard levels with Assassin.

The build split would look like:

Bard 8/Arcane Archer 10/Assassin 22

In fact somebody already posted this build, in the Level 40 builds area.

And if I had thought of posting it in list of top assassin builds. This build would have been number 8, 9, 10

The basic concept is to Hide, fire an arrow at enemy and watch it go SPLAT dead, in either 1 shot, or get paralyzed and die within 2,3,4 shots

You can use set traps as skill but really your going to be PARALYZING, DEATH ATTACKING, SPLATTING KILLING ENEMIES BEFORE THEY EVER SET OFF THE TRAP YOU SET.

Also you can use a ranged bow and arrow to do a Assassin Death Attack, you dont have to hide, sneak up and sneak attack with a shortsword, Rapier, Scimitar, dagger, etc.

You can hide, sneak attack, death attack with bow, arrows.

What you use set trap for is for things like Demons, devils, Undead that you cant death attack, sneak attack.

If Mick or Stag, or whoever posted that Bard/AA/Assassin build can link that build here, I really recommend that you play that Bard/AA/Assassin over that Bard/AA/Blackguard

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
The Rogue13/SD1/Asn26 is not to be scoffed at. 20d6 Sneak Attack. 36+ DC Death attack. Skillpoints én masse. If you're on a server that gives HiPS at Asn8, then no need for SD at all. Don't underestimate the Bard either, Curse Song and Darkness is soooo sweeet!

I am not underestimating the bard or rogue/Assassin Shadowdancer combos.

They are great.

Its just that Ranger 6-9/Shadowdancer 2-5 /Assassin 26 to 32 is EVEN BETTER.

If I ranked the X/Assassin/Shadowdancer builds:

1. Ranger/Assassin/SD

2. Monk/Assassin/SD

3. Bard/Assassin/SD

4. Rogue/Assassin/SD

Assuming all are equally optimized, correctly built

Rogue, Bard/Assassin/SD builds not as good as Ranger, Monk/Assassin/SD builds

GAME MECHANICALLY, OPTIMIZATION SPEAKING.

Also I am not saying Bard, Rogue/Assassin/SD, builds are not good. They are FREAKING AWESOME, AMAZING.

its just that Ranger, Monk/Assassin/SD is even better.

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
I am not underestimating the bard or rogue/Assassin Shadowdancer combos.

They are great.

Its just that Ranger 6-9/Shadowdancer 2-5 /Assassin 26 to 32 is EVEN BETTER.

If I ranked the X/Assassin/Shadowdancer builds:

1. Ranger/Assassin/SD

2. Monk/Assassin/SD

3. Bard/Assassin/SD

4. Rogue/Assassin/SD

Assuming all are equally optimized, correctly built

Rogue, Bard/Assassin/SD builds not as good as Ranger, Monk/Assassin/SD builds

GAME MECHANICALLY, OPTIMIZATION SPEAKING.

Also I am not saying Bard, Rogue/Assassin/SD, builds are not good. They are FREAKING AWESOME, AMAZING.

its just that Ranger, Monk/Assassin/SD is even better.
Well. Epic Dodge is one of the single best feats in the game. There are several ways to get it.
Rogue13
SD10
Monk9/SD5
Rogue10/SD5.

Builds with it is better than builds without. Monk9/SD5/Asn26 beats your mentioned Monk6/SD2-5/Asn28-32 in everything but DC to Death Attacks.

A side note here, you mention Asn 31+ a few times, but it's not possible to go past 30.

It all depends on the setting ofc, but usually you can't always sneak attack or stealth.

Why do you rank the Ranger over Rogue? A Rngr9 will gain 2 AB, but not much more. Less skillpoints, less Sneak dmg. With 6 Ranger you get Only 1 AB and doesn't even get ITWF. I wouldn't do it.

Monk however, gives you a lot more than ranger. No AB, but a little AC, more attacks with better iteratives and movement speed. Also the IKD feats and with 9 lvls you smell the Epic Dodge. Monk items, but you probably have UMD.

With Heavy Asn, I'd say Rogue and Monk are the best. This is my opinion and experience tho. Cleric and Bard is always good, I imagine Cleric15/asn25 is good, as Darkness is poor mans HiPS. Bard14/SD1/Asn25 smells good too. Curse Song wil improve your DA chances.

Sent fra min SM-G950F via Tapatalk
